topics.body:
I was at college all day doing college related things, like making my class schedule

I have *_no_* classes on Fridays, and my classes on Monday-Thrusday start at 12N at the _*earliest*_

I hit the absolute jackpot with my schedule :D

But as a result of that I did not check anything, now to see what the sh!tstorm we call April Fools' Day brought about
